HeliumLogger

Provides a lightweight Swift Logging framework.

Features:

  • Different logging levels such as Warning, Verbose, and Error
  • Color output to terminal

Usage:

import HeliumLogger
import LoggerAPI

Log.logger = HeliumLogger()

Log.verbose("This is a log message.")
